Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

Docs.summary: Specifies the operation to perform on the operands of a comparison.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]
ComparisonOperator specifies the type of comparison to perform in an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition>.
